title: Mobile Self-Directed Learning Course for Structured Programming

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts and mathematical thinking skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain structured programming principles (sequence/selection/iteration structures) via mobile platforms with ≥80% accuracy
Learners can improve programming problem-solving abilities by ≥70% using XML-based quiz systems
Learners can complete project-based assessments based on practical experiences in the platform-independent J2ME environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
